description: DND requires building/facilities and related site infrastructure commissioning (Cx) experience to act in the capacity of CxA and/or act as a Professional Engineering Commissioning (Cx) Consultant.
duration_in_months: Implicit contract duration is 35 months (from 2023-06-27 to 2026-03-31). However, upon request of the proposer, the contract duration may be adjusted.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
# Title
Commissioning Agent Services
# Notice Number
WS3887438531-Doc3887554117
# Amendment Number
2
# Solicitation Number
WS3887438531
# Publication Date
May 4, 2023
# Tender Closing Date
June 27, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
# Amendment Date
June 16, 2023
# Expected Contract Start Date
June 27, 2023
# Expected Contract End Date
March 31, 2026
# Tender Status
Expired
# Category
CNST (Engineering and Research Services)
## Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of an Engineering Consulting firm to provide Commissioning Agent (CxA) services at the Canadian Forces Station (CFS) in Alert, Ellesmere Island, Nunavut. The Contracting Entity is seeking a firm with experience in building and facilities commissioning, as well as related site infrastructure commissioning.

## Procurement Details
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunities**: Nunavut Territory

## Evaluation Criteria
The proposal will be evaluated on a combination of technical merit and price. A shortlist of suppliers will be invited to submit their bids in accordance with the procurement requirements.

## Contact Information
Ho, Hector
hctor.ho@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(see [Ariba Discovery] for further details (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16176176?extsite=MTYxNzYxNzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Additional Information
The procurement is subject to the Agreement Between Inuit of the Nunavut Settlement Area and His Majesty the King in Right of Canada (The Nunavut Directive). Ariba Discovery posting and closing time was updated for clarity in the Requisition ID16176176 response and also CanadaBuys posting closing time as posted.
